Structs/SKRecommendations.html#/s:10Spot.abstract: An array of simplified tracks, ordered according to the parameters supplied.

Structs/SKCategory.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: url
Structs/SKCategory.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: A link to the Web API endpoint returning full details of the category.

Structs/SKCategory.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: makePlaylistsRequest(locale:page:)
Structs/SKCategory.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to get playlists for the current category.

Structs/SKCategory.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: getPlaylists(for:page:completion:)
Structs/SKCategory.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Gets a list of Spotify playlists tagged with the current category.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: local
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: The local catalog instance, which represents the user’s region settings at the time the property is read.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: locale
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: The locale representing the specific storefront/market from which to request catalog content.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: init(locale:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Creates a new, reusable catalog instance with the specified storefront.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: makeAlbumRequest(id:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to get an album.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: getAlbum(withID:completion:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Gets Spotify catalog information for a single album.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: makeAlbumsRequest(ids:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to get several albums.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: getAlbums(withIDs:completion:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Gets Spotify catalog information for multiple albums identified by their Spotify IDs.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: makeArtistRequest(id:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to get an artist.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: getArtist(withID:completion:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Gets Spotify catalog information for a single artist identified by their unique Spotify ID.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: makeArtistsRequest(ids:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to get several artists.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: getArtists(withIDs:completion:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Gets Spotify catalog information for several artists based on their Spotify IDs.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: makeTrackRequest(id:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to get a track.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: getTrack(withID:completion:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Gets Spotify catalog information for a single track identified by its unique Spotify ID.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: makeTracksRequest(ids:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to get several tracks.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: getTracks(withIDs:completion:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Gets Spotify catalog information for multiple tracks based on their Spotify IDs.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: makeFeaturedPlaylistsRequest(date:page:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to get a list of Spotify featured playlists.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: getFeaturedPlaylists(for:page:completion:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Gets a list of Spotify featured playlists (for example, those shown on a Spotify player’s Browse tab).

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: makeNewReleasesRequest(page:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to get a list of new album releases.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: getNewReleases(page:completion:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Gets a list of new album releases featured by Spotify (for example, those shown on a Spotify player’s Browse tab).

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: makeCategoriesRequest(page:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to get a list of categories.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: getCategories(page:completion:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Gets a list of categories used to tag items in Spotify (for example, those shown on a Spotify player’s Browse tab).

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: makeCategoryRequest(id:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to get a single category.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: getCategory(withID:completion:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Gets a single category used to tag items in Spotify (for example, those shown on a Spotify player’s Browse tab).

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: makeAvailableGenresRequest()
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to get available genre seeds for recommendations.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: getAvailableGenres(completion:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Gets a list of available genre seeds used for recommendations.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: makeRecommendationsRequest(genres:artists:tracks:attributes:limit:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to get recommendations based on seed genres, artists, and tracks.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: getRecommendationsBasedOn(genres:artists:tracks:filteredBy:limit:completion:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Gets recommendations based on seed genres, artists, and tracks.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: makeSearchRequest(types:keywords:alternate:unwanted:inOrder:filters:page:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to search the Spotify catalog.

Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: search(for:matching:or:excluding:inOrder:filteredBy:page:completion:)
Structs/SKCatalog.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Gets Spotify catalog information about artists, albums, tracks or playlists that match a keyword string.

Structs/SKCatalog.html.name: SKCatalog
Structs/SKCatalog.html.abstract: A structure used to make requests to the Spotify catalog for top-level items such as albums, artists, tracks, playlists, and others.

Structs/SKCategory.html.name: SKCategory
Structs/SKCategory.html.abstract: A Spotify category representing the genres and moods available in the Spotify catalog.

Structs/SKFeaturedPlaylists.html.name: SKFeaturedPlaylists
Structs/SKFeaturedPlaylists.html.abstract: A structure containing a paginated collection of featured playlists, accompanied by a localized message from Spotify.

Structs/SKRecommendations.html.name: SKRecommendations
Structs/SKRecommendations.html.abstract: A structure representing a list of recommended tracks generated from a list of Spotify seed items.

Structs/SKSeed.html.name: SKSeed
Structs/SKSeed.html.abstract: A structure representing a Spotify media item used to generate a list of recommended tracks.

Enums/SKTrackAttribute.html.name: SKTrackAttribute
Enums/SKTrackAttribute.html.abstract: An enumeration representing the audio attributes available in audio features.

Structs/SKAudioFeatures/Pitch.html.name: Pitch
Structs/SKAudioFeatures/Pitch.html.abstract: The possible keys in which the track can be.

Structs/SKAudioFeatures/Mode.html.name: Mode
Structs/SKAudioFeatures/Mode.html.abstract: The possible modes in which the track can be: major or minor.

Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.name: acousticness
Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.abstract: A confidence measure from 0.0 to 1.0 of whether the track is acoustic. 1.0 represents high confidence the track is acoustic.

Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.name: analysisURL
Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.abstract: An HTTP URL to access the full audio analysis of this track. An access token is required to access this data.

Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.name: danceability
Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.abstract: Danceability describes how suitable a track is for dancing based on a combination of musical elements including tempo, rhythm stability, beat strength, and overall regularity. A value of 0.0 is least danceable and 1.0 is most danceable.

Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.name: duration
Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.abstract: The duration of the track in seconds, with millsecond precision.

Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.name: energy
Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.abstract: Energy is a measure from 0.0 to 1.0 and represents a perceptual measure of intensity and activity. Typically, energetic tracks feel fast, loud, and noisy. For example, death metal has high energy, while a Bach prelude scores low on the scale. Perceptual features contributing to this attribute include dynamic range, perceived loudness, timbre, onset rate, and general entropy.

Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.name: instrumentalness
Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.abstract: Predicts whether a track contains no vocals. Ooh and aah sounds are treated as instrumental in this context. Rap or spoken word tracks are clearly vocal. The closer the instrumentalness value is to 1.0, the greater likelihood the track contains no vocal content. Values above 0.5 are intended to represent instrumental tracks, but confidence is higher as the value approaches 1.0.

Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.name: key
Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.abstract: The key the track is in. See SKAudioFeatures.Pitch for all possible values.

Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.name: liveness
Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.abstract: Detects the presence of an audience in the recording. Higher liveness values represent an increased probability that the track was performed live. A value above 0.8 provides strong likelihood that the track is live.

Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.name: loudness
Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.abstract: The overall loudness of a track in decibels (dB). Loudness values are averaged across the entire track and are useful for comparing relative loudness of tracks. Loudness is the quality of a sound that is the primary psychological correlate of physical strength (amplitude). Values typical range between -60 and 0 db.

Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.name: mode
Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.abstract: Mode indicates the modality (major or minor) of a track, the type of scale from which its melodic content is derived. Major is represented by 1 and minor is 0. See SKAudioFeatures.Mode for enumerated values.

Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.name: speechiness
Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.abstract: Speechiness detects the presence of spoken words in a track. The more exclusively speech-like the recording (e.g. talk show, audio book, poetry), the closer to 1.0 the attribute value. Values above 0.66 describe tracks that are probably made entirely of spoken words. Values between 0.33 and 0.66 describe tracks that may contain both music and speech, either in sections or layered, including such cases as rap music. Values below 0.33 most likely represent music and other non-speech-like tracks.

Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.name: tempo
Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.abstract: The overall estimated tempo of a track in beats per minute (BPM). In musical terminology, tempo is the speed or pace of a given piece and derives directly from the average beat duration.

Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.name: timeSignature
Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.abstract: An estimated overall time signature of a track. The time signature (meter) is a notational convention to specify how many beats are in each bar (or measure).

Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.name: trackURL
Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.abstract: A link to the Web API endpoint providing full details of the track.

Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.name: valence
Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html#/s:10Spotif.abstract: A measure from 0.0 to 1.0 describing the musical positiveness conveyed by a track. Tracks with high valence sound more positive (e.g. happy, cheerful, euphoric), while tracks with low valence sound more negative (e.g. sad, depressed, angry).

Structs/SKTrackLinks.html#/s:10SpotifyKi.name: externalURLs
Structs/SKTrackLinks.html#/s:10SpotifyKi.abstract: Known external URLs for this track. See external URL object for more details.

Structs/SKTrackLinks.html#/s:10SpotifyKi.name: url
Structs/SKTrackLinks.html#/s:10SpotifyKi.abstract: A link to the Web API endpoint providing full details of the track.

Structs/SKRecentTrack.html#/s:10SpotifyK.name: datePlayed
Structs/SKRecentTrack.html#/s:10SpotifyK.abstract: The date and time the track was last played, with millisecond precision.

Structs/SKRecentTrack.html#/s:10SpotifyK.name: context
Structs/SKRecentTrack.html#/s:10SpotifyK.abstract: The context from which the track was played, such as an album or playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylistTrack.html#/s:10Spotif.name: dateAdded
Structs/SKPlaylistTrack.html#/s:10Spotif.abstract: The date and time the track was added.

Structs/SKPlaylistTrack.html#/s:10Spotif.name: userAdded
Structs/SKPlaylistTrack.html#/s:10Spotif.abstract: The Spotify user who added the track.

Structs/SKPlaylistTrack.html#/s:10Spotif.name: isLocal
Structs/SKPlaylistTrack.html#/s:10Spotif.abstract: Whether this track is a local file or not.

Structs/SKSavedTrack.html#/s:10SpotifyKi.name: dateAdded
Structs/SKSavedTrack.html#/s:10SpotifyKi.abstract: The date and time the track was saved.

Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.name: artists
Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.abstract: The artists who performed the track. Each artist includes a link in url to more detailed information about the artist.

Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.name: availableMarkets
Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.abstract: A list of the countries in which the track can be played, identified by their ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code.

Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.name: contentRating
Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.abstract: The content rating of the track, indicating whether the lyrics are explicit, clean, or unknown.

Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.name: discNumber
Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.abstract: The disc number (usually 1 unless the album consists of more than one disc).

Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.name: duration
Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.abstract: The track length in seconds, with millsecond precision.

Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.name: isPlayable
Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.abstract: A Boolean value that is available when Track Relinking is applied. If true, the track is playable in the given market. Otherwise false.

Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.name: previewURL
Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.abstract: A URL to a 30-second preview (MP3 format) of the track. nil if not available.

Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.name: trackLinks
Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.abstract: A value that is available when Track Relinking is applied and is only available if the track linking, in fact, exists (meaning that the requested track has been replaced with a different track). The resource identifiers and locators in the TrackLink instance contain information about the originally requested track.

Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.name: trackNumber
Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.abstract: The number of the track. If an album has several discs, the track number is the number on the specified disc.

Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.name: url
Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.abstract: A link to the Web API endpoint providing full details of the track.

Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.name: album
Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.abstract: The album on which the track appears. The album includes a link in url to full information about the album.

Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.name: popularity
Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.abstract: The popularity of the track. The value will be between 0 and 100, with 100 being the most popular.

Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.name: makeAudioFeaturesRequest()
Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to get audio features for the current track.

Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.name: getAudioFeatures(completion:)
Protocols/Track.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Tra.abstract: Gets audio feature information for the current track.

Structs/SKSavedTrack.html.name: SKSavedTrack
Structs/SKSavedTrack.html.abstract: A Spotify track that has been saved to the current authenticated user’s music library.

Structs/SKPlaylistTrack.html.name: SKPlaylistTrack
Structs/SKPlaylistTrack.html.abstract: A Spotify track that has been added to a Spotify playlist.

Structs/SKTrackLinks.html.name: SKTrackLinks
Structs/SKTrackLinks.html.abstract: A structure representing the links to a relinked Spotify track. See the API Track Relinking guide for more details.

Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html.name: SKAudioFeatures
Structs/SKAudioFeatures.html.abstract: The audio features representing a specific track’s audio attributes.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: isCollaborative
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: true if the owner allows other users to modify the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: externalURLs
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Known external URLs for this playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: url
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: A link to the Web API endpoint providing full details of the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: id
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: The Spotify ID for the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: images
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Images for the playlist. The array may be empty or contain up to three images. The images are returned by size in descending order. See Working with Playlists.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: name
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: The name of the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: owner
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: The user who owns the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: isPublic
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: The playlist’s public/private status: true the playlist is public, false the playlist is private, nil the playlist status is not relevant. For more about public/private status, see Working with Playlists.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: snapshotID
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: The version identifier for the current playlist. Can be supplied in other requests to target a specific playlist version.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: tracksURL
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: A link to the Web API endpoint where full details of the playlist’s tracks can be retrieved.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: totalTracks
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: The total number of tracks in the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: uri
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: The Spotify URI for the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: tracks
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: A collection containing information about the tracks of the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: userDescription
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: The playlist description. Only returned for modified, verified playlists, otherwise nil.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: followers
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Information about the followers of the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: makeNewPlaylistRequest(userID:name:description:isPublic:isCollaborative:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to create a new playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: createPlaylist(named:description:isPublic:isCollaborative:completion:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Creates a new, empty playlist for the current authenticated user.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: makeUpdateDetailsRequest(name:description:isPublic:isCollaborative:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to update a playlist’s details.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: update(name:description:isPublic:isCollaborative:completion:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Changes a playlist’s details, including its name, description, and access levels.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: makeUpdateImageRequest(data:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to upload a custom playlist cover image.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: updateImage(with:completion:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Uploads a custom playlist cover image, replacing the current image used to represent the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: updateImage(with:quality:completion:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Uploads a custom playlist cover image, replacing the current image used to represent the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: makeTracksRequest(locale:page:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to get a playlist’s tracks.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: getTracks(for:page:completion:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Gets the full details for the tracks of a playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: makeAddTracksRequest(tracks:position:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to add tracks to the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: add(_:at:completion:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Adds the given tracks to the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: add(_:at:completion:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Adds the given track to the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: makeRemoveTracksRequest(tracks:snapshotID:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to remove tracks from the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: makeRemoveTracksRequest(positions:snapshotID:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to remove tracks from the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: remove(at:inSnapshot:completion:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Removes one or more tracks from the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: remove(at:inSnapshot:completion:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Removes one or more tracks from the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: removeOccurrences(of:inSnapshot:completion:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Removes all occurrences of the specified tracks from the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: removeOccurrences(of:inSnapshot:completion:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Removes all occurrences of the specified track from the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: makeMoveTracksRequest(startIndex:rangeLength:position:snapshotID:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to reorder tracks in a playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: move(at:before:inSnapshot:completion:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Reorders a track or a group of tracks in a playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: move(at:before:inSnapshot:completion:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Reorders a track or a group of tracks in a playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: move(at:before:inSnapshot:completion:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Reorders a track or a group of tracks in a playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: makeReplaceTracksRequest(tracks:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to replace tracks in the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: replace(with:completion:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Replaces all the tracks in the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: makeFollowRequest(public:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to add the current authenticated user as a follower of the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: follow(makingPublic:completion:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Adds the current authenticated user as a follower of the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: makeUnfollowRequest()
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to remove the current authenticated user as a follower of the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: unfollow(completion:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Removes the current authenticated user as a follower of the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: makeFollowStatusRequest(users:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to check whether the given users are following the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: checkIfFollowed(by:completion:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Check to see if one or more Spotify users are following the playlist.

Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: checkIfFollowed(by:completion:)
Structs/SKPlaylist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Check to see if one or more Spotify users are following the playlist.

Structs/SKArtist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit8SK.name: externalURLs
Structs/SKArtist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit8SK.abstract: Known external URLs for this artist. See external URL object for more details.

Structs/SKArtist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit8SK.name: url
Structs/SKArtist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit8SK.abstract: A link to the Web API endpoint providing full details of the artist.

Structs/SKArtist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit8SK.name: followers
Structs/SKArtist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit8SK.abstract: Information about the followers of the artist.

Structs/SKArtist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit8SK.name: genres
Structs/SKArtist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit8SK.abstract: A list of the genres the artist is associated with. For example: "Prog Rock", "Post-Grunge". (If not yet classified, the array is empty.)

Structs/SKArtist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit8SK.name: images
Structs/SKArtist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit8SK.abstract: Images of the artist in various sizes, widest first.

Structs/SKArtist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit8SK.name: popularity
Structs/SKArtist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit8SK.abstract: The popularity of the artist. The value will be between 0 and 100, with 100 being the most popular. The artist’s popularity is calculated from the popularity of all the artist’s tracks.

Structs/SKArtist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit8SK.name: makeAlbumsRequest(types:locale:page:)
Structs/SKArtist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit8SK.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to get the current artist’s albums.

Structs/SKArtist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit8SK.name: getAlbums(filteredBy:for:page:completion:)
Structs/SKArtist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit8SK.abstract: Gets Spotify catalog information about the current artist’s albums.

Structs/SKArtist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit8SK.name: makeTopTracksRequest(locale:)
Structs/SKArtist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit8SK.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to get the current artist’s top tracks.

Structs/SKArtist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit8SK.name: getTopTracks(for:completion:)
Structs/SKArtist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit8SK.abstract: Gets Spotify catalog information about the current artist’s top tracks.

Structs/SKArtist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit8SK.name: makeRelatedArtistsRequest()
Structs/SKArtist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit8SK.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to get a list of artists similar to the current artist.

Structs/SKArtist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit8SK.name: getRelatedArtists(completion:)
Structs/SKArtist.html#/s:10SpotifyKit8SK.abstract: Gets Spotify catalog information about artists similar to the current artist.

Enums/SKAlbumType.html#/s:10SpotifyKit11.name: appearance
Enums/SKAlbumType.html#/s:10SpotifyKit11.abstract: An album on which the artist appears, but didn’t author.

Structs/SKSavedAlbum.html#/s:10SpotifyKi.name: dateAdded
Structs/SKSavedAlbum.html#/s:10SpotifyKi.abstract: The date and time the album was saved.

Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.name: albumType
Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.abstract: The type of album. See SKAlbumType for possible values.

Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.name: artists
Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.abstract: The artists of the album. Each artist includes a link in url to more detailed information about the artist.

Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.name: availableMarkets
Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.abstract: The markets in which the album is available: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes. Note that an album is considered available in a market when at least 1 of its tracks is available in that market.

Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.name: externalURLs
Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.abstract: Known external URLs for this album. See external URL object for more details.

Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.name: images
Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.abstract: The cover art for the album in various sizes, widest first.

Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.name: name
Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.abstract: The name of the album. In case of an album takedown, the value may be an empty string.

Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.name: url
Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.abstract: A link to the Web API endpoint providing full details of the album.

Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.name: genres
Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.abstract: A list of the genres used to classify the album. For example: "Prog Rock", "Post-Grunge". (If not yet classified, the array is empty.)

Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.name: popularity
Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.abstract: The popularity of the album. The value will be between 0 and 100, with 100 being the most popular. The popularity is calculated from the popularity of the album’s individual tracks.

Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.name: releaseDate
Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.abstract: The date the album was first released, for example "1981-12-15". Depending on the precision, the date may have been returned as "1981" or "1981-12". The precision for this value is provided by the releaseDatePrecision property.

Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.name: releaseDatePrecision
Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.abstract: The precision with which releaseDate value is known. See DatePrecision for possible values.

Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.name: makeTracksRequest(locale:page:)
Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.abstract: Creates and returns the request used to get the current album’s tracks.

Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.name: getTracks(for:page:completion:)
Protocols/Album.html#/s:10SpotifyKit5Alb.abstract: Gets Spotify catalog information about the current album’s tracks.

Structs/SKSavedAlbum.html.name: SKSavedAlbum
Structs/SKSavedAlbum.html.abstract: A Spotify album that has been saved to the current authenticated user’s music library.

Enums/SKAlbumType.html.name: SKAlbumType
Enums/SKAlbumType.html.abstract: The types of albums available in the Spotify catalog.

Structs/Pagination.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: limit
Structs/Pagination.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: The number of items to be contained in the page.

Structs/Pagination.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: offset
Structs/Pagination.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: The index of the first item to be contained in the page.

Structs/Pagination.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: init(limit:offset:)
Structs/Pagination.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Creates a set of pagination parameters based on limit and offset.

Structs/Pagination.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.name: init(limit:page:)
Structs/Pagination.html#/s:10SpotifyKit1.abstract: Creates a set of pagination parameters based on limit and page number.

Protocols/CursorProtocol.html#/s:10Spoti.name: CursorType
Protocols/CursorProtocol.html#/s:10Spoti.abstract: A type that can be used to identify an item in a paging collection.

Protocols/CursorProtocol.html#/s:10Spoti.name: latest
Protocols/CursorProtocol.html#/s:10Spoti.abstract: The key identifying the most recent item in the page.

Protocols/CursorProtocol.html#/s:10Spoti.name: earliest
Protocols/CursorProtocol.html#/s:10Spoti.abstract: The key identifying the least recent item in the page.

Protocols/CursorPagingCollection.html#/s.name: Cursors
Protocols/CursorPagingCollection.html#/s.abstract: A type that contains a set of cursors used to identify items in the collection.

Protocols/CursorPagingCollection.html#/s.name: cursors
Protocols/CursorPagingCollection.html#/s.abstract: The cursors used to identify the first and last items in the page.

Protocols/OffsetPagingCollection.html#/s.name: offset
Protocols/OffsetPagingCollection.html#/s.abstract: The index offset of the items returned in the page, as set in the request or by default.

Protocols/PagingCollection.html#/s:10Spo.name: limit
Protocols/PagingCollection.html#/s:10Spo.abstract: The maximum number of items returned in the page, as set in the request or by default.

Protocols/PagingCollection.html#/s:10Spo.name: total
Protocols/PagingCollection.html#/s:10Spo.abstract: The total number of items available to return.

Protocols/PagingCollection.html#/s:10Spo.name: url
Protocols/PagingCollection.html#/s:10Spo.abstract: A link to the Web API endpoint returning the full result of the request.

Protocols/PagingCollection.html#/s:10Spo.name: nextURL
Protocols/PagingCollection.html#/s:10Spo.abstract: The URL to the next page of items, or nil if no next page exists.

Protocols/PagingCollection.html#/s:10Spo.name: previousURL
Protocols/PagingCollection.html#/s:10Spo.abstract: The URL to the previous page of items, or nil if no previous page exists.

Protocols/PagingCollection.html#/s:10Spo.name: init(from:)
Protocols/PagingCollection.html#/s:10Spo.abstract: Creates a SpotifyKit type from the specified JSON data.

Protocols/PagingCollection.html#/s:10Spo.name: getNext(completion:)
Protocols/PagingCollection.html#/s:10Spo.abstract: Gets the next page of items and provides it to the specified handler, or nil if no next page exists.

Protocols/PagingCollection.html#/s:10Spo.name: getPrevious(completion:)
Protocols/PagingCollection.html#/s:10Spo.abstract: Gets the previous page of items and provides it to the specified handler, or nil if no previous page exists.

Protocols/PagingCollection.html.name: PagingCollection
Protocols/PagingCollection.html.abstract: A collection that provides paginated results from a Spotify Web API request.

Pagination.html#/s:10SpotifyKit14CursorP.name: CursorPageable
Pagination.html#/s:10SpotifyKit14CursorP.abstract: A type that can be returned in a cursor-based paging collection.

Structs/Page.html.name: Page
Structs/Page.html.abstract: A generic collection that provides offset-based paginated results from a Spotify Web API request.

Structs/CursorPage.html.name: CursorPage
Structs/CursorPage.html.abstract: A generic collection that provides cursor-based paginated results from a Spotify Web API request.

Protocols/CursorProtocol.html.name: CursorProtocol
Protocols/CursorProtocol.html.abstract: A type that contains a set of cursors used to identify items and traverse adjacent pages in a cursor-based paging collection.

Structs/Cursors.html.name: Cursors
Structs/Cursors.html.abstract: A structure containing a set of cursors used to identify items in a cursor-based paging collection.

Structs/Pagination.html.name: Pagination
Structs/Pagination.html.abstract: A structure representing the parameters for paginating the elements of a larger collection.

Protocols/JSONDecodable.html#/s:10Spotif.name: init(from:)
Protocols/JSONDecodable.html#/s:10Spotif.abstract: Creates a SpotifyKit type from the specified JSON data.

Protocols/JSONEncodable.html#/s:10Spotif.name: data()
Protocols/JSONEncodable.html#/s:10Spotif.abstract: Encodes the given type to a JSON representation suitable for the Spotify Web API.

Protocols/JSONEncodable.html.name: JSONEncodable
Protocols/JSONEncodable.html.abstract: A type that can encode itself to a JSON representation.

Protocols/JSONDecodable.html.name: JSONDecodable
Protocols/JSONDecodable.html.abstract: A type that can decode itself from a JSON representation.

Structs/SKAuthenticationError.html#/s:10.name: status
Structs/SKAuthenticationError.html#/s:10.abstract: A high-level description of the error, as specified in RFC 6749 Section 5.2.

Structs/SKAuthenticationError.html#/s:10.name: message
Structs/SKAuthenticationError.html#/s:10.abstract: A more detailed description of the error, as specified in RFC 6749 Section 4.1.2.1.

Structs/SKError.html#/s:10SpotifyKit7SKE.name: status
Structs/SKError.html#/s:10SpotifyKit7SKE.abstract: The HTTP response status returned by the Web API.

Structs/SKError.html#/s:10SpotifyKit7SKE.name: message
Structs/SKError.html#/s:10SpotifyKit7SKE.abstract: A short description of the cause of the error.

Structs/SKResponseStatus.html#/s:10Spoti.name: ok
Structs/SKResponseStatus.html#/s:10Spoti.abstract: The request has succeeded. The client can read the result of the request in the body and the headers of the response.

Structs/SKResponseStatus.html#/s:10Spoti.name: created
Structs/SKResponseStatus.html#/s:10Spoti.abstract: The request has been fulfilled and resulted in a new resource being created.

Structs/SKResponseStatus.html#/s:10Spoti.name: accepted
Structs/SKResponseStatus.html#/s:10Spoti.abstract: The request has been accepted for processing, but the processing has not been completed.

Structs/SKResponseStatus.html#/s:10Spoti.name: noContent
Structs/SKResponseStatus.html#/s:10Spoti.abstract: The request has succeeded but returns no message body.

Structs/SKResponseStatus.html#/s:10Spoti.name: notModified
Structs/SKResponseStatus.html#/s:10Spoti.abstract: The response has not changed. See Conditional requests for more details.

Structs/SKResponseStatus.html#/s:10Spoti.name: badRequest
Structs/SKResponseStatus.html#/s:10Spoti.abstract: The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed syntax. The message body will contain more information. See Error Details for more details.

Structs/SKResponseStatus.html#/s:10Spoti.name: unauthorized
Structs/SKResponseStatus.html#/s:10Spoti.abstract: The request requires user authentication or, if the request included authorization credentials, authorization has been refused for those credentials.

Structs/SKResponseStatus.html#/s:10Spoti.name: forbidden
Structs/SKResponseStatus.html#/s:10Spoti.abstract: The server understood the request, but is refusing to fulfill it.

Structs/SKResponseStatus.html#/s:10Spoti.name: notFound
Structs/SKResponseStatus.html#/s:10Spoti.abstract: The requested resource could not be found. This error can be due to a temporary or permanent condition.

Structs/SKResponseStatus.html#/s:10Spoti.name: internalServerError
Structs/SKResponseStatus.html#/s:10Spoti.abstract: An internal server error has occurred. Although unlikely, if you receive this error, please report it here.

Structs/SKResponseStatus.html#/s:10Spoti.name: badGateway
Structs/SKResponseStatus.html#/s:10Spoti.abstract: The server was acting as a gateway or proxy and received an invalid response from the upstream server.

Structs/SKResponseStatus.html#/s:10Spoti.name: serviceUnavailable
Structs/SKResponseStatus.html#/s:10Spoti.abstract: The server is currently unable to handle the request due to a temporary condition which will be alleviated after some delay. You can choose to resend the request again.

Classes/SKRequest/ContentType.html#/s:10.name: json
Classes/SKRequest/ContentType.html#/s:10.abstract: Represents UTF-8 encoded JSON data. This is the format for nearly all PUT, POST, and DELETE requests to the API.

Classes/SKRequest/ContentType.html#/s:10.name: jpeg
Classes/SKRequest/ContentType.html#/s:10.abstract: Represents Base64 encoded JPEG image data. This is the format used when uploading images to the API (e.g., when uploading a custom playlist cover image).

Classes/SKRequest/HTTPMethod.html.name: HTTPMethod
Classes/SKRequest/HTTPMethod.html.abstract: The HTTP verbs used by the Spotify Web API.

Classes/SKRequest/ContentType.html.name: ContentType
Classes/SKRequest/ContentType.html.abstract: The MIME content types available for sending multipart requests to the Spotify Web API.

Classes/SKRequest.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: method
Classes/SKRequest.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: The HTTP method used for this request.

Classes/SKRequest.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: parameters
Classes/SKRequest.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: The parameters for this request, if any. If no parameters are supplied, this will be an empty dictionary.

Classes/SKRequest.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: urlSession
Classes/SKRequest.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: The URL session used to perform the request.

Classes/SKRequest.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: apiSession
Classes/SKRequest.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: The authenticated Spotify API session used to authorize the request.

Classes/SKRequest.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: init(method:url:parameters:)
Classes/SKRequest.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Creates a new request with the specified properties.

Classes/SKRequest.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: init(method:endpoint:parameters:)
Classes/SKRequest.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Creates a new request by specifying the API endpoint from which to request.

Classes/SKRequest.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: add(_:type:)
Classes/SKRequest.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Adds multipart request body data for a PUT, POST, or DELETE request.

Classes/SKRequest.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: perform(completion:)
Classes/SKRequest.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Performs the request, handling API-specific responses and calling the specified handler when complete.

Classes/SKRequest.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: perform(completion:)
Classes/SKRequest.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Performs the request, decoding the JSON data returned by the request to the given type and calling the specified handler when complete.

Classes/SKRequest.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.name: perform(completion:)
Classes/SKRequest.html#/s:10SpotifyKit9S.abstract: Performs the request, calling the specified handler when complete.

Classes/SKRequest.html.name: SKRequest
Classes/SKRequest.html.abstract: An abstract class that represents a request to the Spotify Web API.

Structs/SKResponseStatus.html.name: SKResponseStatus
Structs/SKResponseStatus.html.abstract: The Response Status Codes used by the Spotify Web API, as defined in the RFC 2616 and RFC 6585.

Structs/SKError.html.name: SKError
Structs/SKError.html.abstract: An error returned by the Spotify Web API.

Structs/SKAuthenticationError.html.name: SKAuthenticationError
Structs/SKAuthenticationError.html.abstract: An authentication error returned by the Spotify Web API.
